data.title: Media Relaease Media Release - Jampro Antennas, Inc.
data.meta_description: Media Relaease Media Release - Jampro Antennas, Inc.
data.text: Media Relaease Media Release Jampro contact: Sonia Del Castillo 916-383-1177 Sonia@jampro.com Press Contact: Desert Moon Communications Harriet Diener • 201-995-1133 harriet@desertmooncomm.com For Immediate Release KENT STATE UNIVERSITY'S WKSU-FM TO EXPAND MARKET COVERAGE WITH JAMPRO TRANSLATOR ANTENNAS Kent, OH (July 27, 2006) -- Jampro Antenna / RF Systems of Sacramento, California has been awarded the contract to supply Kent State University's WKSU-FM with two low power Jampro JLLP antennas to expand the station's repeater and translator system. The new installations will augment the stations’ many existing Jampro systems and extend WKSU's coverage to outlying areas. WKSU is a non-commercial public radio station owned by Kent State University that broadcasts NPR news and classical music serving more than 20 Northeastern Ohio counties and parts of Western Pennsylvania. WKSU-FM (89.7) operates its 50,000-watt station from its broadcast center in Kent, plus four other stations - WKSV (89.1) in Thompson, WKRW (89.3) in Wooster, WKRJ (91.5) in New Philadelphia, and WNRK (90.7) in Norwalk - via repeaters. It also operates station W298BA (107.5) in Boardman by way of translator. As a noncommercial, educational FM station WKSU can be authorized by the FCC to rebroadcast its signal via a translator on any FM channel (201 to 300). The maximum effective radiated power permitted for any translator station is 250 watts. The JLLC is the low power version of Jampro's series of side-mount Penetrator antennas. Rated at up to 4 kW maximum input, each bay consists of a Penetrator style radiating element with a corporate feed system. The Penetrator style is the only US made FM antenna design to be awarded a US Patent. A JLLP can be factory-tuned to any frequency in the FM Band II (87.5- 108 MHz) and subsequently tested at Jampro's 7,500-foot full-field test range in California on a Page 1 of 2 6340 Sky Creek Drive • Sacramento, CA 95828 USA • Tel: 916-383-1177 • Fax: 916-383-1182 • WWW.Jampro.com
